word: R. MACKIN: WELL, NOW, THAT WHICH YOU HAVE STATED DOES NOT CORRESPOND WITH OUR EXPERIENCE. WE HAVE BEEN VERY CAUTIOUS IN THIS MATTER, AND WE FIND THAT THE EXPERIENCE THROUGH WHICH WE HAVE PASSED, AND WHICH WE HAVE ENDEAVORED TO OUTLINE BRIEFLY TO YOU THIS MORNING, TALLIES EXACTLY WITH THE EXPERIENCE OF GOD'S SERVANTS OF OLD AS GIVEN IN THE WORD.
